articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Work in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Work in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the work in different fields in Pyongyang.
					The first leg of his guidance was the Pyongyang Catfish Farm.
					
					After being briefed on the operation of the farm, he went round the production processes for hours to learn in detail about the technical equipment and production there. 
					
					Watching each fish pond teeming with fat catfish, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the farm have brought about unprecedented innovations in fish breeding in recent years.
					
					It is a great achievement that the officials and technicians of the farm, in particular, have rapidly increased the fish production in hearty response to the WPK's policy of bringing about a signal turn in the breed fish culture, he said, highly appreciating their feats and extending thanks to them for having made a great contribution to the development of fish culture. 
					
					Then he set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the farm in rapidly boosting the production of catfish.
					
					Noting that in order to enable people to find the catfish bred with good care tastier it is necessary to seek diverse cooking methods, he underscored the need to pay deep attention to the research into this field, too. 
					
					The next leg of his guidance was the December 7 Factory.
					
					He went round the room devoted to the history of the factory and different production processes to acquaint himself in detail with the production there. 
					
					Looking round the work sites kept neat and tidy and seeing a variety of goods produced from there, he was greatly pleased to learn that the workers of the factory have kept production going at a high rate. And he highly appreciated their feats.
					
					Saying that the factory has an important duty and role to play in improving the standard of people's living, he advanced tasks to be carried out by it.
					
					The third leg of his guidance was the completed indoor swimming pool of Kim Il Sung University.
					
					Watching the splendid swimming pool, he said it is an impeccable one. He highly appreciated the feats performed by the soldier-builders.
					
					Then, he watched the swimming training of students.
					
					He said that the swimming pool of the university has been furnished with such high quality equipment and service facilities that it is fully available for the physical training and cultural recreation of its teachers and students and it can host international contests. We find our joy and happiness and the worth of making revolution when seeing this bright and cheerful appearance of the younger generation, the future of the country, he added. 
					
					Then he learned about the progress made in the construction of the library of the university now under way and set forth the tasks to be fulfilled to build it on the best level.
					
					He said with pride that the nation's self-supporting economy is now making rapid progress, fully demonstrating its tremendous potential.
					
					There has never been such bright prospect and abundant fruits in the history of building a great prosperous and powerful nation as today, he said. He earnestly called for bringing earlier the historic day when the people will beat the drum of triumph to declare the emergence of a great prosperous and powerful nation by increasing the speed of advance at this stirring time when a great victory is drawing near. 
					
					He expressed great expectation and conviction that the city of Pyongyang would take the lead in the grand drive to build a thriving nation to play a vanguard role.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, department directors and first vice department directors and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Felicitates Chinese Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Felicitates Chinese Leaders
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Hu Jintao, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC, Wu Bangguo, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, and Wen Jiabao, Premier of the State Council of the PRC, on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the founding of the PRC.
					 The message said:
					
					We, on behalf of the WPK and the government and the people of the DPRK, extend warm congratulations and greetings to you and, through you, to the CPC and the government and the people of the PRC on the occasion of the 60th birthday of the PRC.
					
					The founding of the PRC was an event that brought about a fundamental change in the history of China and the life of its people.
					
					Over the past six decades the diligent and courageous Chinese people have built the socialist state with Chinese characteristics on the vast territory of China, valiantly overcoming manifold trials and difficulties.
					
					Today the Chinese people are registering big successes in their efforts to build a harmonious socialist society based on the scientific view on development under the leadership of the CPC with Hu Jintao as general secretary.
					
					The Korean people are rejoiced over these as over their own and wholeheartedly hope that everything would go well in your country in the future, too. 
					
					The DPRK-China friendship is a valuable asset common to the peoples of the two countries.
					
					It is the consistent stand of the WPK and the government of the DPRK to set store by this friendship that has stood all the trials of history and steadily consolidate and develop it generation after generation.
					
					Expressing belief that the traditional DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations would develop on better terms by the joint efforts of the parties, the governments and the peoples of the two countries, we sincerely wish the PRC prosperity and the Chinese people happiness.

articles.title: DPRK's Will to Strive for Building Nuclear-free World Reiterated
articles.content:
DPRK's Will to Strive for Building Nuclear-free World Reiterated
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on Wednesday as regards the recent summit of the UNSC member nations:
					Heads of state of the UNSC member nations met in New York on September 24 to discuss the issues of nuclear nonproliferation and nuclear disarmament and adopted UNSC Resolution 1887 on building "a world without nuclear weapons."
					
					What matters is that this resolution, too, is a double-standards document as it failed to fully reflect the desire and will of the world community as a whole.
					
					As a matter of fact, the summit should have called into question and dealt with the U.S. nuclear threat and the reality in which peace and stability are being seriously disturbed in different regions due to the above-said threat. 
					
					It is a prerequisite to global denuclearization for the country with the biggest stockpile of nukes to reduce and eliminate them.
					
					The recent resolution deals with the unilateral demands of the nuclear powers to be met by other countries while disregarding the important realistic issues. It is, therefore, nothing but a sinister scheme of the nuclear powers to maintain the sphere of their domination through their nuclear monopoly under the signboard of global denuclearization.
					
					The DPRK was compelled to have access to nuclear deterrent in order to protect the supreme interests of the country and the regional peace and security in face of the high-handed and arbitrary practices to violate the right to peaceful development of the Korean people who have been exposed to the U.S. nuclear threat for more than half a century.
					
					 It has already totally rejected the resolutions the UNSC unreasonably cooked up over its legitimate measures for self-defence.
					
					 The DPRK's dismantlement of nuclear weapons is unthinkable even in a dream as long as there exist the sources that compelled it to have access to nukes.
					
					Moreover, it is unimaginable to expect the DPRK return to the NPT as a non-nuclear state as it failed to play any role in preventing the U.S. forward-deployment of nuclear weapons in south Korea and its growing nuclear threat to the DPRK and has been abused for serving the purpose of the U.S. policy to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 We totally reject UNSC Resolution 1887, too, as it is peppered with the hegemonic ambitions of nuclear powers and will not be bound to it at all. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung advanced an idea of denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula and building a world free from nuclear weapons long ago. And it is the desire of the Korean people to live in a peaceful world without nuclear weapons.
					
					 We will make efforts to denuclearize the peninsula in the context of the building of a world free from nuclear weapons and the U.S nuclear policy toward the DPRK in the future, too, as in the past.

articles.title: KCNA Dismisses S. Korean Chief Executive's "Proposal" as Rubbish
articles.content:
KCNA Dismisses S. Korean Chief Executive's "Proposal" as Rubbish
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive spelt out "Grand Bargain" over the nuclear issue during his recent visit to the U.S.
					This calls for offering things to the DPRK in return for its dismantlement of the core part of its nuclear program through the six-party talks.
					
					The "Grand Bargain" is just a replica of the watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" that proved bankrupt in face of criticism of the public at home and abroad. The chief executive of south Korea, in his statements made before and after the UN General Assembly session, asserted that for the north to respond to his "offer" is "the last opportunity for it to maintain its system." This goes to prove that underlying his utterances are his watchwords "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" aimed at inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen and stifling them.
					
					The nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula should be settled between the DPRK and the U.S. from every aspect as it is a product of the latter's hostile policy toward the former. 
					
					It was the U.S. that attempted to use nuclear weapons during the Korean war to eliminate the DPRK and it is again the U.S. that has waged ceaseless DPRK-targeted nuclear war exercises in the new century, too, after listing the DPRK as the target of its preemptive nuclear attack. But for the U.S. persistent hostility and nuclear threat to the DPRK, the latter would not have been compelled to have access to nukes.
					
					Such being a hard fact, the south Korean chief executive is making much fuss, trumpeting about "Grand Bargain" while failing to say anything to the U.S. It is evident that he seeks to meddle and stand in the way of settling the nuclear issue between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					He might be well aware of the fact that the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula is one to be dealt with between the DPRK and the U.S. But he took the trouble of peddling the above-said "offer" though others are skeptical about it, considering it as unrealistic. He is also to blame for his behavior but more deplorable is the "team of advisors to the president" which puts him to shame under the world's eyes. This makes the world view them as nothing but stupid guys who do not know where they stand.
					
					The south Korean chief executive and his "advisers' team" had better have a midday nap under the nuclear umbrella provided by the U.S. rather than running helter-skelter, unable to sound out its master, much less knowing how the world moves. 
					
					They are seriously mistaken if they calculate the DPRK would accept the ridiculous "proposal" for "the normalization of relations" with someone and for sort of "economic aid".
					
					Korean-style socialism has won steady victories despite the hostile forces' desperate sanctions and the DPRK's nuclear weapons have served as powerful deterrent for preserving peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and other parts of Northeast Asia.
					
					It is a pipedream to expect the DPRK will dismantle its nuclear program without the U.S. drop of its hostile policy toward the DPRK. The nuclear issue can find a genuine solution only when the whole Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world are denuclearized.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Chairman of Orascom
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Chairman of Orascom
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Naguib Sawiris, chairman and CEO of the Orascom Telecom Holding of Egypt, and his party when they paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chairman of Orascom
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chairman of Orascom
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Naguib Sawiris, chairman and CEO of the Orascom Telecom Holding of Egypt, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Naguib Sawiris on Wednesday.

articles.title: Chairman of Orascom Honored with DPRK Order
articles.content:
Chairman of Orascom Honored with DPRK Order
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Order of the DPRK Friendship First Class was awarded to Naguib Sawiris, chairman and CEO of the Orascom Telecom Holding of Egypt, in recognition of the positive contributions he has made to developing the relations of friendship and economic cooperation between the DPRK and Egypt with his boundless respect and reverence for General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il.
					 An order-awarding ceremony was held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Ryu Yong Sop, minister of Post and Telecommunications, and officials concerned.
					
					 The chairman and CEO of the Orascom Telecom Holding of Egypt and his party were on hand.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Nigerian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Nigerian President  
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Alhaji Umaru Musa Yaradua, Nigerian President and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces, on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of the independence of his country.
					 Reaffirming the will to steadily expand and develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Nigeria, Kim in the message sincerely wished the president success in his work for national unity and socio-economic progress.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Cypriot President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Cypriot President  
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Dimitris Christofias, President of Cyprus, on the occasion of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger, Kim in the message wished the president and the people of Cyprus successes in their efforts for the peaceful reunification and development of the country.

articles.title: Chinese Art Troupe Arrives
articles.content:
Chinese Art Troupe Arrives
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- A Chinese art troupe headed by Sun Xiaohong, secretary of the Committee of the Communist Party of China Arts and Entertainment Group, arrived here on Wednesday.

articles.title: Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
articles.content:
Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at Yanggakdo International Hotel on Tuesday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China.
					Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Kang Nung Su, minister of Culture, Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health who doubles as chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, Pak Kyong Son, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					Liu Xiaoming said in his speech at the reception that the founding of new China marked a historic starting point in bringing prosperity to the Chinese nation.
					
					He stressed that the Sino-DPRK friendship provided by the revolutionaries of the elder generation struck deep roots in the hearts of the peoples of the two countries and has brought them well-being and served as common wealth.
					
					It is the steadfast policy of the Chinese party and government to steadily boost the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations, he noted, adding that the Chinese people would carry forward the tradition and carve out a future hand in hand with the Korean people.
					
					 Choe Chang Sik in his speech referred to the achievements made by the Chinese people in various domains under the leadership of the Communist Party of China over the past six decades.
					
					 The DPRK-China friendship which stood all sorts of trials of history is the common wealth deeply cherished by the peoples of the two countries, he noted, adding that this fact is proved once again through the events of the "year of DPRK-China friendship."
					
					 He expressed belief that the bilateral friendship would grow stronger under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 On the same day the Chinese consul general in Chongjin gave a reception to mark the national day of China.

articles.title: Chinese Friendship Associations Gives Reception in China
articles.content:
Chinese Friendship Associations Gives Reception in China
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries and the China-Korea Friendship Association gave a reception on Monday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and China. 
					Present there on invitation were Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, his embassy officials, the delegation of the Foreign Languages Publishing House on a visit to China and DPRK students studying in China.
					
					Attending it were Li Jinhua, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Chen Haosu, president of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries, Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, Hu Zhengyue, assistant to the foreign minister of China, and other officials concerned of the Ministry of Railways, the General Staff of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, etc.
					
					The president of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries said at the reception that visits of high-ranking officials and cooperation and exchange in various fields have become very brisk and diverse events taken place in different domains between the two countries since the announcement of the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship."
					
					He noted that the fraternal Korean people have made great successes in socialist construction in the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude, closely rallied around the Workers' Party of Korea led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					He expressed the belief that the Korean people having glorious revolutionary traditions would make new steady successes in the work to accelerate socialist construction while pulling through difficulties before them, preserve peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in 2012. 
					
					The DPRK ambassador said that the traditional DPRK-China friendship personally provided and fostered by President Kim Il Sung and the revolutionaries of the elder generation of China is growing stronger under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					It is the consistent stand of the Korean party and government to set store by the DPRK-China friendship and consolidate and develop it generation after generation, he said, expressing the will to strive for the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: DPRK Fine Art Exhibition Opens in China
articles.content:
DPRK Fine Art Exhibition Opens in China
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- A DPRK fine art exhibition was opened at the Military Museum of the Chinese People's Revolution in Beijing on Monday to mark the 60th birthday of the People's Republic of China and the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship".
					Displayed in the venue of the exhibition are more than 60 fine art works, produced by famous artists of the DPRK, including Korean paintings, oil paintings and woodcut prints.
					
					Present at the opening ceremony of the exhibition were Li Xiaohua, vice-president of the China Association for International Friendly Contact, Xu Jialu, high-ranking advisor to the China Association for International Friendly Contact and former vice-chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, the deputy secretary general of the Chinese Fine Art Association, the curator of the Military Museum of the Chinese People's Revolution, and other personages from different walks of life and masses and Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, and his embassy officials, the delegation of the DPRK-China Friendship Association led by Jon Chun Sik, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, and DPRK students in China.
					
					Speakers at the opening ceremony expressed expectation that the exhibition vividly showcasing the successes made by the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving socialist nation under the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the beautiful manners and customs and spectacular scenery of Korea would contribute to deepening the friendly feelings between the peoples of the two countries and boosting the DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants looked round the fine art works on display.

articles.title: China-DPRK Friendship Album Published in China
articles.content:
China-DPRK Friendship Album Published in China
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- An "Album Celebrating the 60th Anniversary of Establishment of China-DPRK Diplomatic Relations" was published by the World Affairs Press of China on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and China and the "year of the DPRK-China friendship."
					 An album releasing ceremony took place in Beijing on Sept. 28.
					
					Attending it were Li Jinhua, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Chen Haosu, president of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries, Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, Hu Zhengyue, assistant to the foreign minister of China, and officials concerned.
					
					Present there on invitation were Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, and staff members of his embassy, the delegation of the Foreign Languages Publishing House on a visit to China and DPRK students studying in Beijing.
					
					Gao Shumao, president of the press, and Choe Kyong Guk, head of the delegation, made speeches at the ceremony. 
					
					They noted that the album records the 60-year long history of the DPRK-China friendship which was personally provided by the leaders of the elder generation and is growing stronger under the care of the top leaders of the two countries. 
					
					 Saying that the release of the commemorative album offered an opportunity to know better about the deep historical roots of the DPRK-China friendship, they stressed that they would pool will and efforts of the peoples of the two countries and make the strong friendship between the two countries shine forever.

articles.title: 28th Yun I Sang Concert Closes
articles.content:
28th Yun I Sang Concert Closes
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The 28th Yun I Sang concert was closed.
					 A closing performance took place at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall on Wednesday.
					
					Appreciating the performance were Song Sok Hwan, vice-minister of Culture, officials concerned and creators and artistes of national art organizations.
					
					Among the audience were the daughter of Yun, overseas compatriots staying in the homeland and staff members of the German embassy here.
					
					Taking part in the concert were musicians of the orchestra of the Yun I Sang Music Institute and other national art organizations and the orchestra of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory. 
					
					Put on the stage were orchestral music "149 Curves on Road Leading to Forefront" and small orchestral music "Impression", symphony No. 2 and other music pieces composed by Yun. 
					
					The musicians displayed their high rendition technique while preserving peculiar characteristics of the music numbers.

articles.title: Event on Restart of UNDP Aid to DPRK Held
articles.content:
Event on Restart of UNDP Aid to DPRK Held
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- An event on the restart of UNDP aid to the DPRK was held at the mission of the UNDP here on Wednesday.
					Attending it were officials concerned, members of the visiting UNDP delegation and staff members of the UNDP mission here.
					
					Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here.

articles.title: Mongolian Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Mongolian Photo Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- A Mongolian photo exhibition was opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang International Cultural Centre on Wednesday.
					It was attended by Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned, working people in the city and Sodovjamts Khurelbaatar, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials and Mongolian guests.
					
					Present on invitation were representatives and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					The participants looked round the photos showing the natural landscape and ecological environment of Mongolia.

articles.title: Miraetech Company
articles.content:
Miraetech Company
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The Miraetech Company is one of competent research groups of the DPRK engaged in the development of high-tech goods.
					 It has already invented many technologies and devices to be used in such fields as IT, machine-building and geological prospecting.
					
					 Typical of them are fingerprint recognizer, program for intellectual observation system, drawing technology of Korean jewel picture with natural stone powder and technology of surveying and estimating deposits of placer gold and other useful minerals.
					
					 The technologies and devices have been introduced into different sectors of the national economy and proved effective.
					
					 While developing high-tech goods in a positive way, it is conducting brisk exchange with various countries.

articles.title: Dishcloth Gourd Widely Planted in Residential Quarters
articles.content:
Dishcloth Gourd Widely Planted in Residential Quarters
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Dishcloth gourd has been widely cultivated in the DPRK. 
					Cucumbers as big as forearm are hanging from dishcloth gourd vines in several hundred square meters of fields around apartments Nos. 5 and 11 in Jungsong-dong, Central District, Pyongyang.
					
					 The inhabitants there are tending dishcloth gourd fields with care to carry forward the folk tradition.
					
					 The Korean people have cultivated dishcloth gourd around their houses from olden time and used it widely in their life.
					
					 Dried and peeled dishcloth gourd was used in washing kitchen containers.
					
					 It had been called "chonraksa" and "chonra" in the past in the meaning that it was good for washing kitchen containers.
					
					 Its extract, with medicinal value, is raw materials of lotion, perfume and the like.
					
					 It is easy to cultivate dishcloth gourd because it is strong against blight and harmful insects.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Japan's Test-Fire of PAC-3
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Japan's Test-fire of PAC-3
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The Japan Air "Self-Defence Force" test-fired PAC-3 at a missile launching ground of the United States. 
					 This test-fire, conducted by the Japanese Ministry of Defence after having decided to make the whole country covered with a network of PAC-3s, is a very ill-boding military move.
					
					 The ministry has already decided to deploy PAC-3s at six anti-air units of the ASDF across the country and PAC-3s were deployed in the base of the ASDF in Gakamigahara City, Gifu Prefecture. 
					
					 The ministry has a plan to deploy PAC-3s in Tsuiki base of Fukuoka Prefecture and Kyushu area by next spring. 
					
					 The recent test-fire of PAC-3 is an indication that the moves to turn Japan into a military giant are being pushed forward in real earnest. 
					
					 In other words, these moves are bringing into bolder relief the aggressive nature and danger of Japan's policy of converting itself into a military giant and increasing the danger of a new war in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The test-fire of PAC-3 conducted by Japan after deploying those missiles throughout the country under the pretext of "defence" is part of the serious scheme to turn it into a military giant for the purpose of staging a comeback to Korea.
					
					 Its theory of "intercepting missiles" is nothing but a theory of preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' test-fire of PAC-3 is aimed at winding up their preparations for the above-said reinvasion. 
					
					 Japan absurdly claims that its manufacture, deployment and test-fire of interceptor missiles, etc. are designed to protect Japan and the U.S. from "north Korea's possible missile attack" but this rhetoric can never pull the wool over the eyes of the world community.
					
					 Japan is also crying out for examining the exercise of the "right to collective self-defence" in the direction of intercepting missiles and consolidating the "Japan-U.S. security system". 
					
					 These assertions are very crafty and brazen-faced sophism intended to justify Japan's moves for militarization under the pretext of "threat" from others with the deceptive signboard of "defending Japan and the U.S." 
					
					 Japan's wild ambition to turn itself into a military giant by beefing up its military forces in all aspects is now going beyond its tolerance limit. This is evidenced by the facts that Japan let the SDF whose mission is limited to "defending its territory only" carry out such an offensive mission as overseas aggression and updated its arms and equipment and commanding system and boosted its capability for joint operations with foreign armed forces, etc.
					
					 Japan is now going reckless in its moves to be capable of conducting any military operation for aggression anytime and anywhere.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to stop at once such dangerous war moves as foolish an act as jumping into fire with faggots on one's back.

articles.title: Consolidation of Anti-Imperialist Front Called for
articles.content:
Consolidation of Anti-Imperialist Front Called for
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- To consolidate the anti-imperialist front is one of the basic modes of struggle to be held fast to by the people in their struggle for independence, progress and peace.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The anti-imperialist struggle alone guarantees stability and security of those countries desirous of independence and paves the way for development in the new century.
					
					What is important is for the world progressives to consolidate the anti-imperialist front and wage an uncompromising struggle against the imperialist forces.
					
					Unity in the struggle against imperialism is the source of the inexhaustible strength of the peace-loving forces.
					
					It is very important to hold fast to the principled stand on imperialism in consolidating the anti-imperialist front.
					
					Harboring an illusion about imperialists and failing to see through their nature as aggressors are little short of slackening the struggle against them and, furthermore, opting for a compromise with them.
					
					Differing ideologies, isms and systems are not obstacles in the way of reinforcing the anti-imperialist front.
					
					There is no reason for the world progressives aspiring after peace against war to fail to unite. No conditionality should be allowed in strengthening the anti-imperialist front.
					
					The issue of reinforcing the anti-imperialist front should not be mixed with economic relations. Only then is it possible for any country to carry on the economic construction and foreign trade from an independent stand as required by its specific conditions, prospect of development and the aspiration and wishes of its people and defend political independence and achieve economic self-support. 
					
					The formation of the anti-imperialist front between countries would create conditions favorable for strengthening the anti-imperialist front on a regional scale and give impetus to forming the worldwide anti-imperialist front.
					
					The world progressives should wage a more dynamic struggle for strengthening the anti-imperialist front to foil the imperialists' moves for aggression and war, defend peace, security and stability and promote the prosperity and development of nations.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Nicaragua
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Nicaragua
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The Nicaraguan Group for the Study of the Juche Idea brought out President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Uphold Independence" in pamphlet on Sept. 23.
					The work, published on Sept. 7, Juche 70 (1981), clearly expounds the idea that upholding independence in the party and state activities is the most correct policy meeting the requirements of the present era and indicates the tasks and ways to do so.

articles.title: For Security of Headquarters
articles.content:
For Security of Headquarters
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- It was one day in mid-October, Juche 29 (1940) that a unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army was billeted in a valley.
					Anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk was making a meal at a spring when she saw a thin wisp of smoke rising into the air.
					
					She rushed to the spot and saw some members of the KPRA driving bees out of beehive by kindling fire.
					
					 She severely reproved them for their carelessness, asking why they were making smoke near the bivouac before dark.
					
					After watching them for a while, she said to the following effect: It's good to serve honey to Comrade Commander. But, did you think about the security of the headquarters when you made a fire without vigilance in violation of the discipline of the guerrilla army?
					
					To keep vigilance is the first and foremost duty for us who bear the heavy but honorable duty of defending Comrade Commander. Why do you not think about this? Your careless act, in the long run, is little different from informing the enemy of the position of the headquarters.
					
					The guerrillas hung down their heads, reproaching themselves for their careless act.
					
					Seeing them, she told earnestly that they were defending the Commander, and no matter what they did, they should always pay primary attention to the security of the headquarters.
					
					They respectfully looked up to Kim Jong Suk who put preference to the security of the headquarters anytime and anywhere.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita a los dirigentes del partido y el Estado de China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita a los dirigentes del partido y el Estado de China
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 60o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular China, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, junto con el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema Kim Yong Nam y el primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros Kim Yong Il envio el dia 30 el mensaje de felicitacion al secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y presidente de la RPCh y de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh Hu Jintao, el presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional Wu Bangguo y el primer ministro del Consejo de Estado Wen Jiabao. 
					 El mensaje va como sigue:
					
					Nosotros enviamos la calurosa felicitacion y el saludo cordial a ustedes y por su conducto al PCCh, al gobierno y al pueblo de la RPCh en nombre del PTC, el gobierno y el pueblo de la RPDC en ocasion del 60o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPCh.
					
					La fundacion de la RPCh fue el evento que trajo el cambio radical en la historia de China y la vida del pueblo chino.
					
					Durante los 60 anos pasados, el laborioso y valiente pueblo chino establecio sobre la vasta tierra china el Estado socialista con la peculiaridad china superando audazmente las pruebas y dificultades que se enfrentan.
					
					Bajo la direccion del PCCh presidido por el secretario general Hu Jintao, el pueblo chino logra grandes exitos en la labor para construir la armoniosa sociedad socialista basada en la concepcion del desarrollo cientifico.
					
					El pueblo coreano se regocija como de los suyos al respecto y desea de todo corazon que en lo adelante,  marche bien toda la cosa en vuestro pais.
					
					 La Amistad Corea-China es el precioso tesoro comun de los pueblos de ambos paises.
					
					 Apreciar, consolidar y desarrollar sin cesar de generacion en generacion la Amistad Corea-China, que supero todas las dificultades de la historia, es la posicion invariable del PTC y el gobierno de la RPDC. 
					
					 Convencidos de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y China se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas magnificamente segun los esfuerzos comunes de los partidos, los gobiernos y los pueblos de ambos paises, deseamos de todo corazon a la RPCh la prosperidad y al pueblo chino la felicidad.

articles.title: ATCC condena "proyecto" inutil a la solucion del problema nuclear
articles.content:
ATCC condena "proyecto" inutil a la solucion del problema nuclear
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En su reciente viaje a Estados Unidos, el hombre de alto  rango del Sur de Corea presento un "proyecto de la solucion global" referente al problema nuclear.
					Se dice que se ofrece algo a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea al precio de que esta anule la parte medular del plan nuclear mediante las conversaciones a 6 bandas.
					
					Este "proyecto" no es otro sino la repeticion del proyecto de la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3 mil dolares", ya cancelado al cabo de ser denunciado por el interior y el exterior del pais.
					
					En sus discursos pronunciados antes y despues de la presente Asamblea General de la ONU, el hombre de alto nivel del Sur de Corea dijo tanto que la aceptacion de este "proyecto" por parte de la RPDC deviene la "oportunidad ultima para la existencia de su sistema", en cuyo fondo yacen la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3 mil dolares" para la confrontacion fratricida y la supresion.  
					
					El problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana es el asunto a ser solucionado estrictamente entre la RPDC y EE.UU siendo un producto de la politica hostil del segundo a la primera.
					
					EE.UU. es el pais que durante la guerra coreana (1950-1953) intento usar las armas nucleares para aplastar la RPDC y en el nuevo siglo desarrolla incesantemente los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anotandola en la lista de ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					Si no hubiera existido la persistente amenaza nuclear del imperio contra la RPDC, no habria habido la posesion de las armas nucleares de esta.
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas no expresan ni una protesta a EE.UU., sino arman alborotos presentando el absurdo "proyecto de la solucion global", lo cual muestra el objetivo de ellas de poner obstaculos en la solucion del problema nuclear entre la RPDC y EE.UU.
					
					El hombre de alto rango del Sur de Corea, sabiendas a que el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana es el asunto a ser solucionado entre la RPDC y EE.UU., anda pobremente con ese "proyecto" que otros califican del irreal y tratan de manera esceptica. Esto demuestra que para no hablar de este tipejo, es muy miserable el nivel del "grupo de asistencia al presidente" que lo pone en verguenza ante el mundo.
					
					Todo el mundo calificara a ellos solo de tontos.
					
					Si el hombre de alto rango del Sur de Corea y su "grupo de asistencia" tratan de actuar absurdamente sin saber la corriente mundial ni intento de su amo, para ellos sera mejor dormir la siesta debajo del paraguas nuclear ofrecido por EE.UU.
					
					Es una gran equivocacion el mismo hecho de que piensan en que la RPDC pudiera aceptar esa "propuesta" absurda para "normalizar las relaciones" con alguien y recibir la "ayuda economica". 
					
					Pese a la desesperada sancion de las fuerzas hostiles, el socialismo coreano sale de dia en dia victorioso y nuestra posesion de las armas nucleares deviene el fuerte disuasivo que mantiene la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana  y el resto del Asia Noreste.
					
					Hablar sobre la renuncia nuclear de la RPDC sin abandonar la politica hostil de EE.UU. a esta es un vano sueno.
					
					 El problema nuclear podra ser resuelto de veras solo cuando se logre la desnuclearizacion de toda la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo.

articles.title: Entidades chinas ofrecen banquete
articles.content:
Entidades chinas ofrecen banquete
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ATCC) -- La Asociacion de Amistad del Pueblo Chino con el Extranjero y la Asociacion de Amistad China-Corea ofrecieron el dia 28 un banquete en ocasion del 60o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre Corea y China.
					A la comida fueron invitados el embajador coreano Choe Jin Su y otros miembros de la embajada coreana en China, la delegacion de las Ediciones en Lenguas Extranjeras, de visita en China, y los estudiantes coreanos en este pais asiatico.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicepresidente del Comite Nacional de la Conferencia Consultiva Politica del Pueblo Chino, Li Jinhua, el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad del Pueblo Chino con el Extranjero, Chen Haosu, el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad China-Corea, Wu Donghe, el asistente del ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Hu Zhengyue y otros funcionarios del Ministerio de Ferrocarriles, el Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China.
					
					El presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad del Pueblo Chino con el Extranjero, al hacer uso de la palabra en el banquete, recordo que despues de declarado el "Ano de Amistad China-Corea", se activaron las visitas reciprocas de alto rango entre los dos paises, la cooperacion y el intercambio en diversas ramas y se efectuaron variadas actividades en todas ramas.
					
					Continuo que el hermano pueblo coreano unido monoliticamente en torno al Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezado por el camarada Secretario General Kim Jong Il logra grandes exitos en la construccion del socialismo con el espiritu de autoconfianza y lucha tenaz.
					
					Expreso su confianza de que el pueblo coreano, que tiene las gloriosas tradiciones revolucionarias, continuara logrando nuevos exitos en las labores para acelerar la construccion del socialismo superando las dificultades tropezadas, preservar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana, realizar la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais y abrir en el ano 2012 las puertas a la gran potencia prospera socialista.
					
					 El embajador coreano se refirio a que la tradicional amistad Corea-China preparada y cultivada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y los revolucionarios de veterana generacion de China se profundiza y se desarrolla bajo la gran atencion de los Dirigentes maximos de los dos paises.
					
					Destaco que apreciar la amistad Corea-China y consolidarla de generacion en generacion es la invariable posicion del partido y el gobierno de Corea y manifesto la determinacion de hacer ingentes esfuerzos por desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.

articles.title: ATCC critica prueba de lanzamiento de "PAC-3" de Japon
articles.content:
ATCC critica prueba de lanzamiento de "PAC-3" de Japon
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Las "fuerzas aereas de autodefensa" de Japon realizaron la prueba de lanzamiento de misil antibalistico "PAC-3" en el lugar de lanzamiento de misiles de Estados Unidos
					Resulta muy insolito este movimiento militar realizado despues de que el Ministerio de Defensa de Japon decidio emplazar de manera ampliada el misil antibalistico "PAC-3" en todo el pais.
					
					El Ministerio de Defensa de Japon determino ubicar los misiles antibalisticos "Patriot" en las 6 unidades antiaereas de las "fuerzas aereas de autodefensa" de todo el pais e instalo el misil tierra-aire "PAC-3" en la base aerea situada en la ciudad de Gakamigahara del departamento de Gifu.
					
					Y planea emplazarlo hasta la primavera del ano proximo en la base de Tsuiki del departamento de Fukuoka y la localidad de Kyushu.
					
					La prueba arriba mencionada insinua que las maniobras de Japon por su conversion en la potencia militar se realizan de manera crucial en la etapa mas realista.
					
					En otra palabra, ella pone en relieve la agresividad y la peligrosidad de la politica de Japon para convertirse en la potencia militar y aumenta la peligrosidad del estallido de nueva guerra en el Noreste Asiatico.
					
					Las maniobras de Japon, que bajo el pretexto de la "defensa" emplazo de manera ampliada el "Patriot" en  todo el pais y realizo hasta la prueba de su lanzamiento, devienen un eslabon de las graves maniobras por la conversion del pais en la potencia militar destinada a la nueva agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 La teoria de "interceptacion de misiles" deviene la de ataque preventivo contra la RPDC.
					
					Mediante ese lanzamiento los reaccionarios japoneses dan acicate a la perfeccion de los preparativos de nueva agresion.
					
					Ahora, el pais isleno insiste abiertamente en que la fabricacion, la ubicacion y la prueba de lanzamiento del misil antibalistico, que no pueden enganar la sociedad internacional, se necesitan para "defender Japon y EE.UU. desde el posible ataque de misiles del Norte de Corea".
					
					Como su prolongacion el habla tanto de la necesidad de revisar el ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva" en direccion a "interceptar los misiles", y de fortalecer el "sistema de seguridad Japon-EE.UU.".
					
					Esto deviene la sofisteria extremadamente taimada y descarada para embellecer con el rotulo enganoso de la "defensa para Japon y EE.UU." la realizacion de la militarizacion acusando a otros paises.
					
					Ahora, pasa su limite la ambicion de Japon por la conversion del pais en la potencia militar encaminada a conceder a las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa", cuya mision esta limitada a la "defensa del territorio japones",  la mision de ataque de la agresion a otros paises y a cambiar globalmente para eso el poderio militar como los armamentos, el sistema de mando y la capacidad de operacion conjunta con las fuerzas armadas extranjeras. 
					
					Hoy, Japon vale de todos los medios para poseer la capacidad de desarrollar las operaciones militares agresivas en cualesquier regiones del mundo.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben abandonar de inmediato sus peligrosas maniobras belicas que traeran  su autodestruccion.
